front.title: IANA Registration for Enumservices email, fax, mms, ems, and sms
front.abstract: This document registers the Enumservices "email", "fax", "sms", "ems", and "mms" using the URI schemes 'tel:' and 'mailto:' as per the IANA registration process defined in the ENUM specification RFC 3761. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
